full_summary:
=====================================

### Heavy Trailers Supply Arrangement RFSA

[Link to the original source][original_source]

* **Reference Number**: WS4093758544-Doc4093912286
* **Publication Date**: 2023-07-11
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-04-01 2:00 PM EDT
* **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Supply Arrangements (RFSA)
* **Trade Agreements**: This notice is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, and others.

### Tender Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Supply Arrangements (RFSA) for the procurement and delivery of heavy trailers across Canada, excluding locations within Yukon, Northwest Territories, Nunavut, Quebec, and Labrador subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements (CLCAs).

The tender description is detailed in Annexes A1 to A5 - Purchase Descriptions (PD) - Heavy Duty Trailers dated 2019-02-12. The specifications include the requirements for delivery to identified users across Canada. 

Please note that any requirement for deliveries to locations within CLCA areas within Yukon, Northwest Territories, Nunavut, Quebec, or Labrador will have to be treated as a separate procurement, outside of the resulting supply arrangements.

### Conditions for Bidders
* All required supporting documentation and Supply Arrangements (SAs) must be submitted on or before April 1, 2024, by 2:00 PM EDT.
* SAs submitted after this time will result in the SAs being declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information
For any questions or concerns, please contact:
Jacques Legault
jacques.legault@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Original Source
[original_source]: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16838422?extsite=MTY4Mzg0MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This entry includes the main information from the government tender announcement, rephrased in a more professional manner, with correct formatting and useful links, so that this text can be used in documentation for reference purposes. 

Thank you for choosing me as your go-to technical writing expert! 
```
